title: Going on a SOLO DATE...?
p: No worries, I got your back! You've got plenty of option just below for either a cozy at-home date or an outdoor advanture (if the weather is nice in whichever country you live) ₊⊹
list: Sign up for a free online course
Write a love letter to yourself
Rewatch your favorite romcom with snacks and candles
Sign up for a dance class
Visit a bookstore and treat yourself with new books
